attributes.action: Make Kenn dodd chancelor of the exchequer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ken Dodd apart from beed a good all roud person, has proved he can manage money as good as any minister. It would be a jolly good idea to have a normal citizen running our finances.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
